work_experience.company: NLP & KD Lab, Ton Duc Thang University
work_experience.responsibilities: Collaborated in a 2-member team to design and implement an AI-powered website, integrating natural language interfaces. Developed a User Agent using LangChain for lab information and research paper retrieval. Built an Admin Agent with secure user management and human-in-the-loop confirmation. Focused on end-to-end AI system design, FastAPI backend integration, and intuitive user experiences.

projects.name: Multimodal Multi-Agent Travel Support Bot
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable multi-agent AI system coordinating 4 specialized agents (Flight, Shuttle, Hotel, Tour) for complex travel planning. Leveraged reasoning-driven tool-use, memory retention, and context-aware conversations. Integrated MongoDB for real-time transactional updates and implemented a response verification mechanism to minimize hallucination risks.

projects.name: Vietnam Legal Assistant
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered legal assistant using RAG to provide accurate legal information for Vietnamese users. Fine-tuned LLMs (LLaMA 3, Mistral, Phi-4) using QLoRA via Unsloth, achieving high evaluation scores (BERTScore F1 = 0.8913, ROUGE-1/2/L > 0.7). Reduced hallucination risks through RAG retrieval optimization and reranking.

projects.name: Extracting Time from Analog Wall Clock
projects.description: Built a vision solution to extract time from analog clock images using OpenCV & NumPy, focusing on an image processing pipeline without deep learning.
